Comments.Message:
This is my attempt:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<TransactionSpecification xmlns="http://tempuri.org/X12ParserSpecification.xsd"  TransactionSetIdentifierCode="864">
	<Segment SegmentId="ST" Usage="Required"/>
	<Segment SegmentId="BMG" Usage="Required"/>
	<Segment SegmentId="DTM"/>
	<Loop LoopId="N1" LoopRepeat="200">
		<Name></Name>
		<StartingSegment SegmentId="N1"/>
		<Segment SegmentId="N2"/>
		<Segment SegmentId="N3"/>
		<Segment SegmentId="N4"/>
		<Segment SegmentId="REF"/>
		<Segment SegmentId="PER"/>
	</Loop>
	<Loop LoopId="MIT" LoopRepeat="200">
		<Name></Name>
		<StartingSegment SegmentId="MIT" Usage="Required"/>
		<Segment SegmentId="MSG" Usage="Required"/>
	</Loop>
	<Loop LoopId="N1" LoopRepeat="200">
		<Name></Name>
		<StartingSegment SegmentId="N1"/>
		<Segment SegmentId="N2"/>
		<Segment SegmentId="N3"/>
		<Segment SegmentId="N4"/>
		<Segment SegmentId="REF"/>
		<Segment SegmentId="PER"/>
	</Loop>
	<Segment SegmentId="SE" Usage="Required"/>
</TransactionSpecification>

I believe this is correct:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<TransactionSpecification xmlns="http://tempuri.org/X12ParserSpecification.xsd"  TransactionSetIdentifierCode="864">
	<Segment SegmentId="ST" Usage="Required"/>
	<Segment SegmentId="BMG" Usage="Required"/>
	<Segment SegmentId="DTM"/>
	<Loop LoopId="N1" LoopRepeat="200">
		<Name></Name>
		<StartingSegment SegmentId="N1"/>
		<Segment SegmentId="N2"/>
		<Segment SegmentId="N3"/>
		<Segment SegmentId="N4"/>
		<Segment SegmentId="REF"/>
		<Segment SegmentId="PER"/>
	</Loop>
	<Loop LoopId="MIT" LoopRepeat="200">
		<Name></Name>
		<StartingSegment SegmentId="MIT" Usage="Required"/>
		<Loop LoopId="N1" LoopRepeat="200">
			<Name></Name>
			<StartingSegment SegmentId="N1"/>
			<Segment SegmentId="N2"/>
			<Segment SegmentId="N3"/>
			<Segment SegmentId="N4"/>
			<Segment SegmentId="REF"/>
			<Segment SegmentId="PER"/>
		</Loop>
		<Segment SegmentId="MSG" Usage="Required"/>
	</Loop>
	<Segment SegmentId="SE" Usage="Required" Trailer="true"/>
</TransactionSpecification>
